Verses: 1 adharkuppinbu Yobu Than Vaayaith Thirandhu, Thaan Pirandha Naalai Sabiththu,
2 vasaniththu Sonnadhu Ennavendraal:
3 naan Pirandhanaalum Oru Aanpillai Urpaththiyaayitrendru Sollappatta Raaththiriyum Azhivadhaaga.
4 andha Naal Andhagaarappaduvadhaaga; Dhevan Uyaraththilirundhu Adhai Visaariyaamalum, Oli Adhinmel Pragaasiyaamalum,
5 andhagaaramum Marana Irulum Adhaik Karaippaduththi, Mappu Adhaimoodi, Mandhaaranaalin Bayangarangal Adhai Arukkalippaakkuvadhaaga.
6 andha Raaththiriyai Andhagaaram Pidippadhaaga; Varushaththin Naatkalil Adhu Sandhoshappadugira Naalaayiraamalum Maadhangalin Kanakkile Adhu Varaamalum Povadhaaga.
7 andha Raaththiri Thanimaiyaayiruppadhaaga; Adhile Gembeerasaththam Illaamarpovadhaaga.
8 naalai Sabikkiravargalum, Livyaadhaanai Ezhumbappannaththakkavargalum, Adhai Sabippaargalaaga.
9 adhin Asthamanakaalaththil Thondriya Natchaththirangal Irundu, Adhu Edhirpaarththirundha Velichcham Undaagaamalum, Vidiyarkaalaththu Veluppai Adhu Kaanaamalum Iruppadhaaga.
10 naan Irundha Karppaththin Vaasalai Adhu Adaikkaamalum, En Kangal Kaangira Varuththaththai Maraiththuvidaamalum Irundhadhe.
11 naan Karppaththildhaane Azhiyaamalum, Karppaththilirundhu Purappadugirapodhe Saagaamalum Ponadhenna?
12 ennai Endhikkolla Madiyum, Naan Paalunna Sthanangalum Undaayirundhadhenna?
13 appadiyillaadhirundhaal, Asaiyaamal Kidandhu Amarndhirundhu,
14 paazhnilangalil Thangalukku Maaligaiyaikkattina Boomiyin Raajaakkalodum Mandhirimaargalodum,
15 alladhu, Ponnai Udaiyavargalum, Thangal Veedugalai Velliyinaal Nirappinavargalumaana Prabukkalodunkooda Naan Ippozhudhu Thoongi Ilaippaaruvene.
16 alladhu, Velippadaadha Mudhiraappindampolavum, Velichchaththaik Kaanaadha Sisukkal Polavum Iruppene.
17 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Thondharavu Ange Oindhirukkiradhu; Belanatru Vidaaiththupponavargal Ange Ilaippaarugiraargal.
18 kattundirundhavargal Ange Egamaaga Amaindhirukkiraargal; Odukkugiravanudaiya Saththam Ange Ketkappadugiradhillai.
19 siriyavanum Periyavanum Ange Sariyaayirukkiraargal; Adimai Than Ejamaanukku Neengalaayirukkiraan.
20 maranaththukku Aasaiyaaik Kaaththirundhu, Pudhaiyalaith Thedugiradhupola Adhaith Thediyum Adaiyaamarpogiravargalum,
21 predhakkuzhiyaik Kandupidiththadhinaal Migavum Kalikoorndhu,
22 adharkaaga Sandhoshappadugira Nirbaakkiyarumaagiya Ivargalukku Velichchamum, Manasanjalamulla Ivargalukku Jeevanum Kodukkappadugiradhinaal Palan Enna?
23 than Vazhiyaik Kaanak Koodaadhapadikku, Dhevanaal Valaindhukollappattavanukku Velichchaththinaal Palan Enna?
24 en Pojanaththukku Munne Enakkup Perumoochchu Undaagiradhu; En Kadharudhal Vellampol Purandupogiradhu.
25 naan Bayandha Kaariyam Enakku Nerittadhu; Naan Anjinadhu Enakku Vandhadhu.
26 enakku Sugamumillai, Ilaippaarudhalumillai, Amaidhalumillai; Enakkuth Thaththalippe Nerittadhu.
